mapper.select: SELECT sug_no, place_name, name, mem_cnt, resv_date FROM suggestion a JOIN customer_req b ON a.req_no = b.req_no JOIN user c ON a.user_no = c.user_no JOIN place d ON a.place_no = d.place_no WHERE isresv = "Y" and date(resv_date) > date(now()) and a.user_no = #{userNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE suggestion SET isresv = 'N' WHERE sug_no = #{sug_no};
